tool.name: GromppMdrun
tool.description: Wrapper of the GROMACS grompp module and the GROMACS mdrun module.

param.name: input_gro_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS structure GRO file

param.name: input_top_zip_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS topology TOP and ITP files in zip format

param.name: input_cpt_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS checkpoint file CPT

param.name: input_ndx_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS index files NDX

param.name: input_mdp_path
param.help: Path to the input GROMACS MDP file

param.name: outname_output_trr_path
param.help: Path to the GROMACS uncompressed raw trajectory file TRR

param.name: outname_output_gro_path
param.help: Path to the output GROMACS structure GRO file

param.name: outname_output_edr_path
param.help: Path to the output GROMACS portable energy file EDR

param.name: outname_output_log_path
param.help: Path to the output GROMACS trajectory log file LOG

param.name: outname_output_xtc_path
param.help: Path to the GROMACS compressed trajectory file XTC

param.name: outname_output_cpt_path
param.help: Path to the output GROMACS checkpoint file CPT

param.name: outname_output_dhdl_path
param.help: Path to the output dhdl.xvg file only used when free energy calculation is turned on

param.name: config_json
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax
